DOC.brief_summary: Primary: â€¢ To compare the safety profile of a single intravenous administration of AVP-21D9 as compared with Placebo Secondary: - To evaluate the pharmacokinetics (PK) of a single intravenous administration of AVP-21D9 - To evaluate the immunogenicity of AVP-21D9
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Pharmacokinetics Study of Human Monoclonal Antibody (AVP-21D9)
DOC.detailed_description: This is a sequential, dose-escalating healthy volunteer study of the safety and pharmacokinetics of intravenously-infused AVP-21D9.
DOC.criteria: Key Healthy volunteers, between 18 and 45 years of age Normal laboratory (blood test) results Key Prior immunization with anthrax vaccine
